string.name: User name
string.description: This name will appear in network browsers for the current node.

string.name: User description
string.description: This description will appear in network browsers for the current node.

eventid.name: Event On
eventid.description: Receiving this event ID will turn the output on.

eventid.name: Event Off
eventid.description: Receiving this event ID will turn the output off.

eventid.name: Event On
eventid.description: This event will be produced when the input goes to HIGH.

eventid.name: Event Off
eventid.description: This event will be produced when the input goes to LOW.
